title: Evil Pumpkin Icon, what does it means by any gift?
body:
Is it specific on what kind of gift, because I gifted a friend RP and they did the same for me, and we still didn't get the icon yet?

I just want to know if gifting RP counts as any gift, so we don't have to wait for two weeks after the event to find out that we didn't get the icon?

replies.body:
It says **any gift**, so RP gifting should count towards the icon. Note that the final day to receive the icon is November 17th, so if you don't have anything by then, hit us up in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any questions.
Ok, I just wanted to make sure, thank you for replying.
Hey. You got the icon eventually? Im asking because i 've given a friend RP for the _SNOW DAY SCUTTLER ICON _
Yeah I did, it was a long while but it eventually arrived, now I'm too waiting for Snow Day Scuttler Icon to eventually arrive.
